Mod0_Description: {c_important}Corpse Tendrils{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_9} * 100|%|]{/c} chance when damaging enemies to drop a {c_important}{u}Blood Orb{/u}{/c}.
Mod2_Description: Enemies who are in range of {c_important}Corpse Tendrils{/c} are Slowed by {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%|]{/c} before being Pulled.
Mod1_Description: Enemies damaged by {c_important}Corpse Tendrils{/c} are made {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_11}]{/c} seconds.
name: Corpse Tendrils
